channel.title: Linking Progress Report to Rest of script
channel.description: How would I link the Progress Report to the rest of the script so that if I mine 1978 ess overnight, the "Q=1" will change each ess mined?

item.title: Linking Progress Report to Rest of script
item.dc:creator: @N4TH4N N4TH4N
item.description:
@N4TH4N wrote:

call the ProgressReport function every time Ess is banked and make sure you do something like
Q := Q + 27;

BTW, don’t be afraid to post in your other topic about Progress Reports ;).

Read full topic
item.source: Linking Progress Report to Rest of script
